name: Achim's project portfolio
body:
### [LXC (LibXConvolver)](https://github.com/AchimTuran/LibXConvolver)
LXC is a highly optimized cross platform open source library for [fast convolution](https://en.wikipedia.org/?title=Convolution#Fast_convolution_algorithms). The library has a simple API, which can be used for real application, prototyping or as a tutorial on how to use the included functions to develop more complex applications.
![Software/Architecture] (images/LXC_SoftwareArchitektur_EN.png)

### [asplib (Achim's Signal Processing LIBrary)](https://github.com/AchimTuran/asplib/)
This is my cross platform C/C++ signal processing library. At the moment it includes the following features:
- A cross platform biquad filter class with factory design pattern to create filters with different processor optimizations
- Frame buffer, frame ring buffer and normal buffer implementations through a C/C++ template class interface
- An easy to use PortAudio interface class for rapid prototyping of C/C++ audio processing algorithms
- The project is still under development and features where added from time to time if you wanna search for more informations just follow this [link](https://github.com/AchimTuran/asplib/) to my github.com repository.
